short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How much longer do we have to deal with this fascist clown?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This very simple plugin helps you keep track of how much longer we have to deal with this "president."

It shows in the icon the number of days to go. You can also change it to the days complete, or percent to go or complete. IF you click on the icon you will see all of those in more detail, as well as the options.
